title: The Wrecking Crew
description: Matt Helm has been sent halfway around the world to find and destroy the mythically elusive agent they called Caselius. His only lead to him is a woman, who might or might not be a double agent. Before Helm finally faces Caselius up in the bleak north woods of the Swedish ore country, two women will die, two more will be charged up to Matt Helm's account, in heaven or in hell.
author: Donald Hamilton
